definition: to circle/to go back/to turn around/to answer/to return/to revolve/Hui ethnic group (Chinese Muslims)/time/classifier for acts of a play/section or chapter (of a classic book)

sentences.english: Early Shang Dynasty thought was based upon cyclicity.
sentences.chinese: 商代早期的思想是根据旋回。

sentences.english: Polycyclic sedimentation formed an oil generating system with multiple polygenetic hydrocarbon.
sentences.chinese: 多旋回沉积产生多元复合成烃的生油体系。

sentences.english: The research can be used to interpret similar inharmonious thickness variation in isochronic strata correlation.
sentences.chinese: 可用于解释类似相域等时旋回厚度的不协调变化。

sentences.english: It was recognized that different orogenic cycles were accompanied by corresponding granitic rocks.
sentences.chinese: 不同的造山旋回伴有相应的花岗岩。

sentences.english: There are at least nine physiographic cycles in the middle reaches of the Yellow River during the Late Cenozoic Era.
sentences.chinese: 在晚新生代黄河中游至少存在九个地文期旋回。

sentences.english: Major cyclonic surface current systems in the oceans.
sentences.chinese: 旋回在海洋中的主要旋转表面水流系统。

sentences.english: He turned her face without resistance and kissed her on the mouth.
sentences.chinese: 他把她的脸旋回过来，丽莎并不推避，他亲了她的嘴。

sentences.english: Each cycle of magma movement has different characteristics and metallogenic specificity.
sentences.chinese: 各旋回的岩浆运动有著不同的特点和成矿专属性。

sentences.english: Hailar Basin is a meso-cenozoic of multicycle, composite-style, fault-sag basin.
sentences.chinese: 海拉尔盆地是一个中新生代多旋回复杂叠合盆地。

sentences.english: The polycyclic development of geosynclinal belts is controlled by the cyclicity of subduction during e geological time.
sentences.chinese: 地质时期地槽的多旋回发展受到俯冲作用旋回的控制。

sentences.english: The polycyclic development of geosynclinal belts is controlled by the cyclicity of subduction during e geological time.
sentences.chinese: 地质时期地槽的多旋回发展受到俯冲作用旋回的控制。

sentences.english: All these researches provide a new clew for the quantitative classification of the cycle.
sentences.chinese: 这也为沉积旋回的定量划分提供了一种新的思路。

sentences.english: The variety of these mudstone and shales is very complex in lacustrinehigh-frequency cycle.
sentences.chinese: 这些泥岩和页岩在湖相高频旋回中的变化相当复杂。

sentences.english: All these researches could provide a new clew for the quantitative division of sedimentary cycle.
sentences.chinese: 这为沉积旋回的定量划分提供了一种新的思路。

sentences.english: Each cycle of magma movement has different characteristics and metallogenic specificity.
sentences.chinese: 各旋回的岩浆运动有着不同的特点和成矿专属性。

sentences.english: So-called 4th sequence is a system tract practically with no cyclicity .
sentences.chinese: 四级层序就是体系域，不具有旋回性。

definition: to spin rapidly/to whirl around/(of time) to fly by
to make an about-turn/to reverse one's direction, policy, sequence etc/to turn things on their head
to move relative to one another
